name: Lobe Chat
description: An open-source, modern-design ChatGPT/LLMs UI/Framework. Supports speech-synthesis, multi-modal, and extensible (function call) plugin system. One-click deployment of your private OpenAI ChatGPT/Claude/Gemini/Groq/Ollama chat application. To get started, add your OpenAI API key in the settings or configure one of the many other providers.
short_desc: An open-source, modern-design AI chat framework
author: LobeHub
